entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
